page.title: 10THE MILKMAN.
page.content: Mr.Sharman is the local milkman.He gets up at 4.00am in the morning.He also has two helpers.The milk is delivered to him from Co-Op Dairy Peterborough.Apart from milk he sells cream.He goes about 30 miles a day which covers Northorpe, Obthorpe, Thurlby, Wilsthorpe, Manthorpe, Braceborough, Kates-Bridge.He does not deliver on Wednesdays.He sells about a 1,000 pints a day.He has four rounds. After each round he has to fill up his milk float.His milk float takes him on his round.Channel Islands milk is 26p a bottle.The semi-skimmed milk is 23p a bottle.The sterilised milk is 25p a bottle.He whistles on his round and wakes everyone up.This means he is a very cheerful person.He has a cheery word for everyone.Many dogs bark as he whistles.Then there is a clattering of bottles.
